content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| project 
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer,
    SessionID_d,
    ProcName_s,
    ProcCPUPercent_d,
    ProcIOPSRead_d,
    ProcIOPSWrite_d,
    ProcWorkingSetMB_d,
    ProcNetKBPS_d
| extend 
    TotalIOPS = round(ProcIOPSRead_d + ProcIOPSWrite_d, 1),
    CPUPercent = round(ProcCPUPercent_d, 1),
    WorkingSetMB = round(ProcWorkingSetMB_d, 1),
    NetKBPS = round(ProcNetKBPS_d, 1)
| project 
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer,
    SessionID_d,
    ProcName_s,
    CPUPercent,
    TotalIOPS,
    WorkingSetMB,
    NetKBPS
| order by CPUPercent desc

uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL
| where SessionUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionGUID_g),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionID_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionProtocol_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionConnectionState_s),
    make_set(SessionClientName_s,10),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,TimeGenerated),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, SessionLogonTime_s),
    AvgSessionProcessCount = avg(SessionProcessCount_d),
    AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent = avg(SessionCPUUsagePercent_d),
    AvgSessionIOPS = avg(SessionIOPS_d),
    AvgSessionWorkingSetMB = avg(SessionWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgSessionNetKBPS = avg(SessionNetKBPS_d),
    AvgSessionRpLatencyMs = avg(SessionRpLatencyMs2_d),
    AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs = avg(SessionRoundTripTimeMs_d),
    SumSessionIOCount = sum(SessionIOCount_d),
    TotalLogonTimeMs = sum(TotalLogonTimeMs_d)
by SessionGUID_g
|project 
SessionGUID = SessionGUID_g,
Host = Computer,
ID = SessionID_d,
["Logon time"] = SessionLogonTime_s,
["Logon duration (s)"] = round(TotalLogonTimeMs/1000,2),
["Last seen"] = TimeGenerated,
["Last state"] = SessionConnectionState_s,
["Protocol"] = SessionProtocol_s,
["Avg. #processes"] = round(AvgSessionProcessCount),
["Avg. CPU (%)"] =round( AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent,1),
["Avg. IOPS"] = round(AvgSessionIOPS,1),
["Avg. IO latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(round(AvgSessionRpLatencyMs/SumSessionIOCount,1)),'n/a',tostring(round(AvgSessionRpLatencyMs/SumSessionIOCount,1))),
["Avg. RAM (MB)"] = round(AvgSessionWorkingSetMB),
["Avg. network (KB/s)"] = round(AvgSessionNetKBPS,1),
["Avg. ICA latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs),'n/a',tostring(round(AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs,1))),
["Remoting clients"] = set_SessionClientName_s
| sort by ['Logon time'] desc
content.title: Sessions

content.query:
uberAgent_CitrixSession_SessionConfig_CL
|where SessionUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmVolumes_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,DisplayMode_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireColorDepth_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireComponentEncoder_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireHardwareEncodeInUse_b),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireVideoCodecType_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireColorspace_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireVideoCodecUse_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkConnectedVia_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterSessionPrinter_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionUser_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionTransportProtocols_s)
by SessionUser_s
| project 
["Mapped volumes"] = replace_string(CdmVolumes_s, ";"," , "),
["Display mode" ] = DisplayMode_d,
["Thinwire color depth (bit)"] = ThinwireColorDepth_d,
["Thinwire component encoder"] = ThinwireComponentEncoder_s,
["Thinwire hardware encode"] = ThinwireHardwareEncodeInUse_b,
["Thinwire video codec type"] = ThinwireVideoCodecType_s,
["Thinwire color space"] = ThinwireColorspace_s,
["Thinwire video codec usage"] = ThinwireVideoCodecUse_s,
["Connected via"] = NetworkConnectedVia_s,
["Mapped printers"] = replace_string(PrinterSessionPrinter_s, ";"," , "),
["Audio channel actual priority"] = AudioActualPriority_s,
["CDM channel actual priority"] = CdmActualPriority_s,
["Printer channel actual priority"] = PrinterActualPriority_s,
["USB channel actual priority"] = USBActualPriority_s,
["Thinwire channel actual priority"] = ThinwireActualPriority_s,
["Transport protocols"] = SessionTransportProtocols_s,
User = SessionUser_s,
Host = Computer
| evaluate narrow()
| project Column, Value
content.title: Citrix settings (last seen values)

content.query:
uberAgent_CitrixSession_SessionConfig_CL
|where SessionUser_s == @"JVR4J\administrator"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyAllowMicrophoneRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyAllowRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicySoundQuality_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyAllowDriveRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyReadOnly_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyFps_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyUseHardwareEncoding_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyUseVideoCodec_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyVisualQuality_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicyAcceptSessionReliabilityConnections_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityPort_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityTimeout_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicyICAListenerPortNumber_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyAllowRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyAutoCreateClientPrinters_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyAllowPNPRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyAllowUSBSupport_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionUser_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionLogonTime_s)
by SessionUser_s
| project 
["Microphone redirection"]= AudioPolicyAllowMicrophoneRedirection_b,
["Audio redirection"]= AudioPolicyAllowRedirection_b,
["Audio channel priority"]= AudioPolicyPriority_s,
["Sound quality"]= AudioPolicySoundQuality_s,
["Client drive mapping"]= CdmPolicyAllowDriveRedirection_b,
["Read-only client drive access"]= CdmPolicyReadOnly_b,
["CDM channel priority"]= CdmPolicyPriority_s,
["Thinwire FPS"]= toint(ThinwirePolicyFps_d),
["Thinwire channel priority"]= ThinwirePolicyPriority_s,
["Thinwire hardware encoding"]= ThinwirePolicyUseHardwareEncoding_b,
["Thinwire video codec"]= ThinwirePolicyUseVideoCodec_s,
["Thinwire visual quality"]= ThinwirePolicyVisualQuality_s,
["Session reliability connections"]= NetworkPolicyAcceptSessionReliabilityConnections_b,
["Session reliability port"]= toint(NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityPort_d),
["Session reliability timeout (s)"]= toint(NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityTimeout_d),
["ICA listener port"]= toint(NetworkPolicyICAListenerPortNumber_d),
["Printer redirection"]= PrinterPolicyAllowRedirection_b,
["Printer channel priority"]= PrinterPolicyPriority_s,
["Auto-create client printers"]= toint(PrinterPolicyAutoCreateClientPrinters_d),
["USB PNP redirection"]= USBPolicyAllowPNPRedirection_b,
["USB support"]= USBPolicyAllowUSBSupport_b,
["USB channel priority"]= USBPolicyPriority_s,
["Logon time"]=SessionLogonTime_s,
User = SessionUser_s,
Host = Computer
| evaluate narrow()
| project Column, Value
| extend Value = case(Value == "true", "Allowed", Value == "false", "Disallowed", Value)
content.title: Citrix policies (last seen values)

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Send Volume (MB)"]=sum(NetTargetSendMB_d),
    ["Receive volume (MB)"]=sum(NetTargetReceiveMB_d)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Send Volume (MB)'], ["Receive volume (MB)"]
content.title: Network data - Send Volume over time

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg Send Latency"]=iff(isnan(avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)),0.0,avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d))
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ["Avg Send Latency"]
content.title: Network data - Average Send Latency

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg. RAM (MB)"]=round(sum(ProcWorkingSetMB_d),1)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Avg. RAM (MB)']
content.title: RAM over time

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"]=round(sum(ProcCPUPercent_d),1)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Avg. CPU (%)']
content.title: CPU over time

content.query:
let ProcDetails = uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
|  summarize
    processNames = make_set(ProcName_s,20),
    sum(ProcCPUPercent_d),
    sum(ProcIOPSRead_d),
    sum(ProcIOReadCount_d),
    sum(ProcWorkingSetMB_d),
    sum(ProcNetKBPS_d),
    sum(ProcIOLatencyReadMs2_d),
    sum(ProcIOLatencyWriteMs2_d)
    by AppId_s, TimeGenerated, Computer
| summarize 
    ["Process name(s)"]= make_set(processNames,20),
    AvgProcCPUPercent = avg(sum_ProcCPUPercent_d),
    AvgProcIOPS = avg(sum_ProcIOPSRead_d),
    SumProcIOCount = sum(sum_ProcIOReadCount_d),
    AvgProcWorkingSetMB = sum(sum_ProcWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgProcNetKBPS = avg(sum_ProcNetKBPS_d)
    by AppId_s;



let uiDelayDetails = uberAgent_Application_UIDelay_CL
| where User_s == @"{User}"
| summarize
    UIDelayMs = sum(UIDelayMs_d)
    by AppId_s;

let latencyDetails = uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s == @"{User}"
| summarize
    Latency = avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)
    by AppId_s;



ProcDetails
| join kind=leftouter uiDelayDetails on AppId_s
| join kind=leftouter latencyDetails on AppId_s
| project
    ["App Name"] = AppId_s,
    ["Process name(s)"] = tostring(["Process name(s)"]),
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"] = round(AvgProcCPUPercent, 1),
    ["Avg. IOPS"] = round (AvgProcIOPS,1),
    ["Avg. RAM (MB)"] = round(AvgProcWorkingSetMB, 0),
    ["Avg. net thruput (KB/s)"] = round (AvgProcNetKBPS,1),
    ["Avg. net latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(round(Latency,1)),"n/a",tostring(round(Latency,1))),
    ["UI unresponsiveness (s)"] = round(UIDelayMs/1000,1)
| sort by tolower(["App Name"]) asc;
content.title: Applications
